name: ADOBE
description: Adobe Creative Cloud is the industry-standard suite of creative applications including Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects, and Premiere Pro. This integration allows AI agents to manage creative assets, collaborate on projects, automate workflows, and integrate with Creative Cloud libraries for comprehensive creative automation.

scopes.creative_sdk: Access Creative Cloud APIs and services
scopes.projects_read: Read creative projects and collaboration data
